name: Teaching and Learning Varieties of Canadian French
description: (Offered in English) This course offers students the opportunity to become familiar with the primary research methods used in sociolinguistic studies, with how sociolinguistics helps to understand the properties of Canadian French, and with the pedagogical implications arising from sociolinguistic research on Canadian French. This course will contain a research-based component. All written work is completed in French for students who wish to petition the department for credit toward a Specialist or Major in French. [24L]
